title: Gamification-Based Language Leadership Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Language education program for corporate managers/leaders, combining gamification strategies (quests, level systems, avatar customization) with personalized learning paths considering individual learning styles (visual/auditory/kinesthetic)

learning_goals: Learners can design language proficiency assessment tools for individual learners by utilizing gamification strategies in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can develop three or more gamified language education contents suitable for diverse learning styles (visual/auditory/kinesthetic).
Through project-based assessment, learners can propose one or more gamified language education scenarios applicable to real-world corporate settings.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
